data.Summary: Experienced Information Security Officer with a demonstrated history of working in the banking industry. Strong professional skilled in Enterprise Risk Management, Commercial Lending, Banking, Security Policy, and Vulnerability Management.
data.Title: Sr. Information Security Consultant

positions.Title: Infomation Security Officer, VP
positions.Description:
•	Update and develop Information Security Program to adhere to State and Federal Regulatory requirements.
•	Develop a comprehensive Incident Response program for Cybersecurity Events
•	Conduct and analyze the results of periodic vulnerability testing of IT assets
•	Support and aid in internal audits of Information and technology systems.
•	Develop and maintain an information security training program including curriculum development, online resource assignment and in person training.
•	Provide guidance and counsel to information security risks and best practices.
•	Maintain a comprehensive risk profile of all information and technology assets.

positions.Title: Information Security Officer
positions.Description:
•	Implement and maintain security systems consulting on detection and containment of sensitive data; prevention of unauthorized modification, destruction, or disclosure of information.
•	Perform internal audits of Bank systems to find and remediate vulnerabilities. 
•	Perform database reporting, consulting, maintenance, and development; administer all databases and related servers bank-wide (24 branches in Southern California) ensuring data integrity, consistency, and recovery control. 
•	Perform Application Development; plan, review, and evaluate data flows for database including modifications to existing designs; communicate changes acting as primary technical consultant for all database related problems. 
•	Consultant for bank’s key security procedures and risk policy and procedural documentation: risk assessment program, information systems policy, privacy policy, and incident response program; compliance with Federal regulation and external audit preparation, execution and response.
•	Identify, diagnose, resolve and consult on technical problems, escalation, and solution tracking; analyze and manipulate data to determine integration with other systems; skilled in writing reports using query reporting systems.
•	Expertise as Consultant on financial reporting, internal network development and security including SQL 2000 through 2012 integrations and reporting web sites.

positions.Title: Network Systems Techinician
positions.Description: Provide hardware/software desk top customer service/support for NMCI Navy/Marine Corps computer systems and peripherals; review and troubleshoot critical DoD software and hardware.
